disp.mydata=TRUE
mydata.format=site
disp.association=FALSE
disp.region=FALSE
sample.labels=CpG 
symbols=circle-fill
lab.Y=log
mydata.ref=cg02162897
disp.color.ref=TRUE
pval.threshold=4.720623e-06
mydata.large.format=region_asso
disp.association.large=TRUE
disp.region.large=TRUE
sample.labels.large=Gene expression 
color.list.large=pink
symbols.large=square-fill
start=38290160
end=38303219
cormatrix.format=raw
disp.cormatrixmap=TRUE
cormatrix.method=spearman
cormatrix.color.scheme=bluewhitered
disp.phys.dist=TRUE
disp.color.bar=TRUE
disp.legend=TRUE
disp.mult.lab.X=FALSE
image.type=pdf
image.title="Example a-DMR in CYP1B1 in Adipose tissue"
image.size=7
genome=hg19
dataset.gene=hsapiens_gene_ensembl
